post:
**Our Offer:**

Sz1Hosting Group have invested in a new location - Chișinău, Moldova. All plans in this location include advanced DDoS protection that can hold attacks up to 500gbps, 700 mpps (UDP) and 500 mpps (TCP)


**Features:**

* Advanced DDoS Protection
* 1Gbps Port Speed
* European Location
* 1 Dedicated IPv4
* Native IPv6
* RAID 5 Node

**Our plans:**

**MD-256-OVZ**  
256MB RAM  
256MB Swap  
550GB Data Transfer  
1 vCPU core  
15GB Disk  
[$3.79/month](https://hostingandvps.com/billing/cart.php?gid=12)  


**MD-512-OVZ**  
512MB RAM  
512MB Swap  
1TB Data Transfer  
1 vCPU Core  
20GB Disk  
[$5.00/month](https://hostingandvps.com/billing/cart.php?gid=12)  


**MD-1GB-OVZ**  
1024MB RAM  
1024MB Swap  
2.1TB Data Transfer  
2 vCPU Cores  
50GB Disk  
[$7.00/month](https://hostingandvps.com/billing/cart.php?gid=12)  


We can also provide custom configurations - please just send me a PM or make a sales ticket.


**Payment Methods:**  
We currently only accept PayPal.
